description:
At the Sakuraba residence, Aoi`s father isn`t willing to listen to Kaoru at first. But both Aoi and Miyabi insist on Aoi`s wish. And when Aoi`s mother takes their side as well, Kaoru is allowed to speak.
But when he starts to explain his current situation, the head of the Sakuraba family blames him for being a traitor, betraying Aoi`s love by running away from the Hanabishi family. Suddenly Kaoru feels that Aoi is holding his hand... but then Aoi`s father leaves the room without a word.
